cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yameru

sentence.kanji: 話すのを止めてください。
sentence.romaji: hanasu no wo yamete kudasai
sentence.english: Stop talking, please.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's aruku

sentence.kanji: 駅まで歩きましょう。
sentence.romaji: eki made arukimashou
sentence.english: Let's walk to the station.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hashiru

sentence.kanji: 彼は毎晩3キロ走っています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha maiban sankiro hashite imasu
sentence.english: Every night he runs three kilometers.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tateru

sentence.kanji: 私たちは来年、家を建てます。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha rainen ie wo tatemasu
sentence.english: We're building a house next year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tomeru

sentence.kanji: 車を止めて。
sentence.romaji: kuruma wo tomete
sentence.english: Stop the car.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tomaru

sentence.kanji: 今朝、事故で電車が止まりました。
sentence.romaji: kesa jiko de densha ga tomarimashita
sentence.english: The train stopped this morning due to an accident.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yamu

sentence.kanji: 雨が止みました。
sentence.romaji: ame ga yamimashita
sentence.english: The rain stopped.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hodou

sentence.kanji: 歩道を歩きましょう。
sentence.romaji: hodou wo arukimashou
sentence.english: Let's walk on the pavement.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's itei

sentence.kanji: 申し込むには一定の資格が要る。
sentence.romaji: moushikomu ni ha itei no shikaku ga iru
sentence.english: You need certain qualifications to apply.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tadashii

sentence.kanji: それは正しい答えです。
sentence.romaji: sore ha tadashii kotae desu
sentence.english: That's the correct answer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shoujiki

sentence.kanji: 彼女はとても正直だ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha totemo shoujiki da
sentence.english: She's very honest.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shougatsu

sentence.kanji: お正月にはたいてい、家族が集まる。
sentence.romaji: oshougatsu ni ha taitei kazoku ga atsumaru
sentence.english: Our family usually gets together for the new year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tatsu

sentence.kanji: ここに来年、家が建ちます。
sentence.romaji: koko ni rainen ie ga tachimasu
sentence.english: Our house will be built here next year.

cards.english: go over, go across, go beyond
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koeru

sentence.kanji: 私たちは高い山を越えました。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha takai yama wo koemashita
sentence.english: We went over a tall mountain.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kagi

sentence.kanji: 出かける時は鍵を掛けてください。
sentence.romaji: dekakeru toki ha kagi wo kakete kudasai
sentence.english: Please lock the door when you go out.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's wadai

sentence.kanji: ここが話題のレストランです。
sentence.romaji: koko ga wadai no resutoran desu
sentence.english: This is the restaurant that we were talking about.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's teiin

sentence.kanji: 降りてください、定員オーバーです。
sentence.romaji: orite kudasai teiin o-ba- desu
sentence.english: Please get off, we are over capacity.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuushi

sentence.kanji: 雨で運動会が中止になったの。
sentence.romaji: ame de undoukai ga chuushi ni nata no
sentence.english: The athletic meet has been canceled due to the rain.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dai

sentence.kanji: その曲の題を思い出せません。
sentence.romaji: sono kyoku no dai wo omoidasemasen
sentence.english: I can't remember the title of the tune.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sadameru

sentence.kanji: 税に関する新しい法律が定められたぞ。
sentence.romaji: zei ni kansuru atarashii houritsu ga sadamerareta zo
sentence.english: A new law concerning taxes was established.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mitei

sentence.kanji: この件の担当者は未定です。
sentence.romaji: kono ken no tantousha ha mitei desu
sentence.english: It's not yet decided who the person in charge of this matter will be.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tokutei

sentence.kanji: 警察は犯人を特定したらしいよ。
sentence.romaji: keisatsu ha hannin wo tokutei shita rashii yo
sentence.english: The police seem to have determined the criminal.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shudai

sentence.kanji: この小説の主題は反戦です。
sentence.romaji: kono shousetsu no shudai ha hansen desu
sentence.english: The main theme of this novel is opposition to war.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's antei

sentence.kanji: 彼は精神の安定が必要よ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha seishin no antei ga hitsuyou yo
sentence.english: He needs mental stability.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gakureki

sentence.kanji: その職は大卒の学歴が必要だ。
sentence.romaji: sono shoku ha daisotsu no gakureki ga hitsuyou da
sentence.english: That job requires a college diploma.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tatemae

sentence.kanji: 本音と建て前は違うことが多いよ。
sentence.romaji: honne to tatemae ha chigau koto ga ooi yo
sentence.english: What people really think and what they say are often different.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's teisei

sentence.kanji: 間違いを訂正しました。
sentence.romaji: machigai wo teisei shimashita
sentence.english: I corrected the mistakes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's annojou

sentence.kanji: 案の定、彼は遅刻したな。
sentence.romaji: annojou kare ha chikoku shita na
sentence.english: Just as I thought, he was late.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sei

sentence.kanji: 書類は正と副の2通あります。
sentence.romaji: shorui ha sei to fuku no nitsuu arimasu
sentence.english: The document consists of the original and a copy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sokutei

sentence.kanji: これから身長と体重を測定します。
sentence.romaji: korekara shinchou to taijuu wo sokutei shimasu
sentence.english: Now your height and weight will be measured.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seishiki

sentence.kanji: 正式な招待状を受け取りました。
sentence.romaji: seishiki na shoutaijou wo uketorimashita
sentence.english: I received a formal invitation.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nobiru

sentence.kanji: 工事の予定が1ヶ月延びてしまった。
sentence.romaji: kouji no yotei ga 1 kagetsu nobite shimata
sentence.english: The construction schedule has been postponed for one month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nobasu

sentence.kanji: 出発を一週間延ばしたの。
sentence.romaji: shupatsu wo ishuukan nobashita no
sentence.english: I delayed my departure for a week.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shoumei

sentence.kanji: 容疑者のアリバイが証明されました。
sentence.romaji: yougisha no aribai ga shoumei saremashita
sentence.english: The suspect's alibi was proven.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's buki

sentence.kanji: 彼らは武器を取り、立ち上がった。
sentence.romaji: karera ha buki wo tori tachiagata
sentence.english: They took arms, and stood up.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bushi

sentence.kanji: 彼の家柄は武士でした。
sentence.romaji: kare no iegara ha bushi deshita
sentence.english: He's from a samurai family.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's daimei

sentence.kanji: この本の題名は「坊ちゃん」です。
sentence.romaji: kono hon no daimei ha bochan desu
sentence.english: The title of this book is "Botchan".

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koutei

sentence.kanji: 僕は彼のしたことは肯定できないな。
sentence.romaji: boku ha kare no shita koto ha koutei dekinai na
sentence.english: I can't agree with what he did.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's masani

sentence.kanji: 彼は正に英雄ね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha masani eiyuu ne
sentence.english: He's a real hero.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shikirini

sentence.kanji: 彼は頻りに時計を気にしていた。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shikirini tokei wo ki ni shite ita
sentence.english: He keeps looking at the clock.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taishou

sentence.kanji: 祖母は大正生まれです。
sentence.romaji: sobo ha taishou umare desu
sentence.english: My grandmother was born in the Taisho era.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kosu

sentence.kanji: 暑さは峠を越したね。
sentence.romaji: atsusa ha touge wo koshita ne
sentence.english: The worst of the heat has passed.
